meanings.definition: Resembling oats in appearance or texture.
meanings.sent1: The oatlike cereal tasted delicious with milk.
meanings.sent2: Her hair had an oatlike color and softness.
meanings.sent3: The oatlike clouds in the sky seemed almost good enough to eat.
meanings.sent4: The oatlike fields stretched out endlessly, a sea of golden waves.
meanings.sent5: The oatlike fabric felt comforting against her skin, like a warm hug.
